p: Figure 1 illustrates the proposed methodology structure for the biorefinery synthesis through economic and exergetic incremental returns of the investment. As an initial step, a detailed bibliographic review is done to establish the main production process (linear chain) and various extensions to consider, and the data collection provides options for possible additions of a base case and the necessary information such as operating conditions, required equipment, specifications, input flow, raw material, and its properties, among other data of significant relevance for subsequent evaluations.
